item.ermc.scepter_of_the_all_knowing.no_: The Scepter knows of no valuables here...

§5§oRight-Clicking with the Scepter in hand will reveal all nearby valuables §r§e§o(Ores).
tooltip.ermc.uchigatana_katana.tooltip:
§5§oA katana with a long single-edged curved blade. 
A unique weapon wielded by the samurai from the Land of Reeds.

The blade, with its undulating design, boasts extraordinary sharpness.
§fHOLD §e§n§lSHIFT§f For More Information
tooltip.ermc.uchigatana_katana.tooltip.s: Katana Class Weapon; Does moderate damage in exchange for faster strike speed.
